text: isee kaaran hamane banee israeel par likh diya[1] ki jisane bhee kisee praanee kee hatya kee, kisee praanee ka khoon karane athava dharatee mein vidroh ke bina, to samajho usane poore manushyon kee hatya[2] kar dee aur jisane jeevit rakha ek praanee ko, to vaastav mein, usane jeevit rakha sabhee manushyon ko tatha unake paas hamaare rasool khulee nishaaniyaan laaye, phir bhee unamen se adhikaansh dharatee mein vidroh karane vaale hain
